name: 514-33	514A-87	514-28
text: Waiver of inspection.  The commission may waive an inspection when in its opinion, a preliminary, contingent final, final, or supplementary public report can be substantially drafted and issued from the contents of the questionnaire and other or subsequent inquiries. [L 1977, c 98, pt of §2; gen ch 1985; am L 1991, c 44, §6; am L 1997, c 135, §6]
